Fathom {5}{B}{B} [i](If you cast this by sacrificing a creature or Vehicle and paying the fathom cost reduced by that permanent’s mana value, put this onto the battlefield as a creature after it resolves or loses targets.)[/i]
Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
notes:
UB:
 - even MV only
 - Zombies
BR:
 - Five curses
 - Curses
WB:
 - triggered abilities
 - flicker
BG:
 - mana value 3 or greater
 - graveyard (lands)
